text: Yadi ahile pani munaphika ra ti manisaharu, jasako hrdayama roga chan ra jasale madina (saharama) mithya aphavaha phaila'irakheka chan, tyaso garna chadenan bhane hamile tapa'ila'i uniharuko barbadiko lagi laga'idine chaum, . Ani tiniharu kehi dinako lagi matra tapa'isanga yaham rahanasakne chan
